description: The man who took hostages in the city’s business district was described by the prime minister as “an armed person claiming political motivation.”
title: Hostage Standoff in Sydney, Australia
title_page: Hostage Standoff in Sydney, Australia - The New York Times
maintext:
Hostage Standoff in Sydney, Australia
The man who took hostages in the city’s business district was described by the prime minister as “an armed person claiming political motivation.”
